summary: Client Sarah convened a vision meeting and the PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA did not provide input (marked not_addressed). No decisions were made.

actions.task: Propose project name options and circulate to client and team for selection

risks.risk: Project name not decided, which may delay vision alignment and subsequent planning.
risks.mitigation: PM to propose name options promptly and solicit responses from the client and team to finalize the project name.
